lines: !if {!is {me} se_id12} = True and {!data status_effect {2} params type} = Negative
!say You would have been {!data status_effect {2} params emoji} {!data status_effect {2} title}, but you were ✨ Immune!
!say You would have been 💫 Stunned, but you were immune!
!if {!tag {me} equip_body} = 🦺 and {!data status_effect {2} params type} = Negative
!throw Your 😶‍🌫️ Smokescreen level cannot be above 98.
!say You gain **{!data status_effect {2} params emoji} {!data status_effect {2} title} {amt}**!
